question: One of the ideas of the current Indian Government is the introduction of elements of “para diplomacy” in India’s foreign policy. Which of the following is a correct statement regarding this?
option1: Para diplomacy is a part of Neighbourhood First Policy
option2: Prime Minister Narendra Modi made a surprise visit to Lahore in 2015 as a part of Para Diplomacy
option3: Trade Relations are at focus of the Para Diplomacy
option4: Cities and States of India are involved in Para Diplomacy
answer: Cities and States of India are involved in Para Diplomacy
explanation: One of the innovative idea of Modi govt is the introduction of elements of para diplomacy in India’s foreign policy where each states and cities would be encouraged to forge special relation with countries or federal states of another country or even cities of their interest in order. {wiki}
